= loopOne =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [Syntax ] > [loopOneMethod loopOne]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$varName* _String_
  Variable which will be looped. Must contain $ at the beggining.
 * *$asVarName* _String_
  Name of variable being result of iteration.
 * *$keyName* _String_ = null
  Optional. Use it when you want to have $varName's key available.


Remove (detach) all matched nodes besided first one and than wrap it with  PHP foreach loop iterating $varName.
Method DOES change selected elements stack. Returned is first element.
Example  
{{{
 $template['ul li']->loopOne('foo', 'bar', 'i');

}}}
Source  
{{{
 <ul>
   <li>first</li>
   <li>second</li>
 </ul>

}}}
Result  
{{{
 <ul><?php
 foreach($foo as $i => $bar) {
 ?><li>first</li><?php
 }
 ?></ul>

}}}
Proposed names: 
loopFirst
